meanings.definition: Larger in size or amount than another.
meanings.sent1: The elephant is greater than the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The mountain is greater than the hill.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so big, it was greater than the table!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was greater than any treasure.
meanings.sent5: The storm brought a greater amount of rain than expected.

meanings.definition: More important or significant than another.
meanings.sent2: Health is greater than material possessions.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was greater than the king!
meanings.sent4: Her words carried a greater weight than anyone else's.
meanings.sent5: The impact of his speech was greater than anticipated.

meanings.sent1: My grandmother is greater than my little brother.
meanings.sent2: The ancient tree is greater than the sapling.
meanings.sent3: The old clock felt greater than the new one.
meanings.sent4: Her wisdom made her seem greater than her years.
meanings.sent5: The history book revealed a greater past than imagined.
